185902450.review:
Игра старой школы, говорить про графику не буду, 2009 год алё.
Слышал об этой игре очень давно, но играть совсем не тянуло, какой-то шутер с элементами хорора, честно говоря не очень смесь, мне тогда казалось именно так.
Купил по скидке, решил пройти, и очень рад что ознакомился, первые 2 часа игры мне казалось что я попусту трачу своё время, однообразные коридоры, какая-то серость, и иногда где-то Альма мелькает, это вступление нужно как можно быстрее пробежать, иначе можно забросить игру, к середине игры начинает выплывать динамика, дают новые ганы, и врагов убивать становиться намного интересней, + можно иногда передернуть свой корнишончик на обнаженную Альму и на её сладкие губки.

Знакомство с серией начал не в хронологическом порядке, как куплю первую часть наклипаю обзор и там.

Секси фотоняшка Альма спустя годы заслуживает твёрдую "9"

185841180.review:
Una entrega con un salto gráfico notable que va acompañado de una interfaz un tanto chocante al inicio, pero justificada dentro de lo diegético. 

Una secuela que apunta más a la acción, y que claro, “se aleja” de lo que “debería ser”, pero eso está bien, ya que rescata muchos aspectos notables del primer F.E.A.R. y sin dudas cumple como shooter que continua la historia previa con una nueva dirección en todos sus apartados artísticos. 
Aunque eso sí, abusa de las “notitas” (no importa que sean “virtuales”) repartidas por doquier con mucho texto en lugar de presentarlo de una manera más orgánica

Recomendado

185640725.review: В своё время фанател от этой части,а вот первая для меня была недопонята и казалась мне однообразной.  .Но время идёт мнение с годами меняется и теперь первая часть для меня один из любимых шутанов.В плане постановки 2 часть конечно же стала лучше,как и в плане локаций,да и вообще игра стала разнообразней. А вот ИИ врагов деграднул,так же и с оружием какая то хрень, если в первой части стволы грохотали и чувствовался импакт,то тут какие то пукалки которые еле грохочят и импакт как будто хуже стал .Как бы там ни было ,это не отменяет того что F.E.A.R. 2: Project Origin хороший щутер ,который увы растерял главную фишку оригинала -умный ИИ который и по меркам 2024 года даст прикурить современным играм.

185544793.review:
Fear 2 and Fear 3 are my favorites in the series. So unlike the first game which was so dark and dusty that it was borderline unplayable and just more like a really bad haunted house, Monolith actually made a fun game with awesome setpieces, a great soundtrack, and improved audio, graphics, and some nice new additions to the world and story from the first. Immediately, you'll notice the lighting and shading is much better, as well as the characters and animations being an upgrade across the board. Dynamic shadows now work in conjunction with soft lighting, bloom, and a cool in world republic commando styled HUD. Throughout the game, NPCs interact with the world and other npcs as well as you more often than the first, and the locations are much more varied instead of being the same offices, sewers, and warehouses.

There's a lot of different locations, including high rise housing, secret labs, a hospital, bombed out city streets, subway tunnels, obviously there's the spooky school which is probably everyone's favorite, alongside a nuclear power plant and a few others like a train and big construction areas. The thing that stuck out to me most was the places in this game felt real, and not like reject Halo 2 maps in the first game. The soldiers had conversations with each other outside of combat as well as killing civilians from around corners, making them more believable, since you could see them doing things regardless of you, which it barely felt like prior. When I was in a fight in a construction area, one of the soldiers crawled under a pipe and tried to flank me while his buddies were shooting, which was well animated, even during an intense battle with tons of effects

Speaking of, the animations and characters were improved, now looking more expressive and emotional, Vaduk being one of my favorite new characters, as he was a pretty well acted villain who yelled and raged a lot when his troops kept getting killed by me. Probably having the most memorable line in the game: "Good morning, chickpea!" Although I was disappointed that he was mostly behind glass and wasn't a boss, instead dying in a qte. But then again, this was a game made in 2009 so whatever.

The characters and squad you're with in the game had very good animations, lip sync was on point, and alongside the character animations being improved, so were the guns, which previously barely had reload animations, or the few that did had very stiff looking ones that made them look extremely robotic or at times not working at all like the dual pistols. Speaking of guns, they were also pretty good. Very responsive, shot fast, and reloaded fast as well. The hit impacts were very well made, instead of blinding me with smoke, they opted for Mortal Kombat or Doom levels of blood and having tons of sparks flying off of armor. I found this method to work much better and not stop the gameplay in its tracks like it did before.

The AI would do smart stuff like crawling as mentioned before, but another thing I liked was the enemy variety and improved scares. Beforehand, the enemies in the first game were either soldiers with guns who sounded the same throughout due to being replica clones controlled by Fettel, ghosts who exist, and maybe some heavy and melee monsters that looked really cheap. Now there's Armacham, the Replicas, failed commanders, flashy ghosts, heavies, snipers, big mechs, and armored cars, and a few others. 

So a much better variety of enemies with much better animations and variety in personality. Alongside this, the scares now have much better production value, with spooky flashing and pulsating lights, fire, death, whispering, ghosts, and destruction, as well as Alma being kind of scary now, I say kind of because she's really not scary in any of these games, but this one clearly tried the hardest to make her scary. Meanwhile in Fear 1, most of the scares were pretty janky and more akin to a really bad haunted house at 3am. Needless to say, I'm not scared by shriveled up Empress Palpatine lol.

Overall, Fear 2 is a fun, if not very dumb game that improved on the original in almost every way. The only downside was that even though I think they improved the AI and their behaviors, the environments not being as open like an industrial jungle gym really hurt their presentation. The reject Halo 2 maps of the first were very flat and boring, but I can't say they were predictable by comparison. Both are good approaches, but both were dragged down in some regard, so pick your poison. I pick Fear 2 or 3, because both of them have awesome music and mech sections. As well as just being more fun and looking much better. 

Horror is overrated sometimes. I think have to agree with 3's design of just having not a lot of scares, teaming up with Ghost Fettel, and killing everything you see in the tri-state area with big guns in coop. I'd love something like that in a Fear 4, like a drop in drop out spooky coop game with swappable squads and characters with different abilities and customizable guns and maybe more drivable vehicles too. Wouldn't hurt, plus I imagine if everyone's a silent dork like Pointman and Becket, it'd be fairly cheap to put together.

Anyway, Fear 2's awesome. Thanks for reading my review. Goodbye!

185543029.review:
Можна сміливо заявити, що ця частина технічно значно краща, ніж перша. Перша бере своїм сюжетом та атмосферою, проривним поглядом на механіки для жанру шутерів. Але переваги другої частини беззаперечні: стабільні 60 FPS із підтримкою сучасних моніторів із високою роздільною здатністю. Після труднощів проходження оригінальної F.E.A.R. (та її доповнень), ця гра нарешті працює так, як треба.

Правда, є й невеликі недоліки. Якщо F.E.A.R. задавала планку для жанру на 10 років уперед, то F.E.A.R. 2 наче намагається більше бути у тренді, через що виникає відчуття дежавю. Як казав Леонід Данілович: Ну, це ж вже було... І дійсно: якось дуже прісно та узагальнено. Відчувається сильна схожість, як мінімум, із Crysis 1, і це можна побачити за елементами інтерфейсу, подачею сюжету та типографікою. В усьому іншому недоліків нема.

Чудовий сюжетний шутер на декілька вечорів (якщо ви цінуєте свій вільний час). Новий двигун видає настільки чудову картинку, що гра виглядає дуже й дуже достойно, навіть у 2025 році.

Щодо арсеналу: загалом він копіює набір із першої частини. Тільки вибору трохи менше, і модельки трішки інші.

Отже, якщо ви ще не грали у F.E.A.R 2, її можна сміливо рекомендувати.

185492702.review:
F.E.A.R. 2: Project Origin successfully builds upon the foundation of the original, delivering a more polished and cinematic experience while retaining the series’ signature blend of intense action and psychological horror.
The game’s combat is as satisfying as ever, with responsive controls, impactful weapons, and the return of slow-motion (bullet time) mechanics that make every firefight a thrilling spectacle. 
The enemies are relentless and cunning, ensuring battles feel challenging and engaging.
Where F.E.A.R. 2 truly shines is its atmosphere. 
The environments are varied and detailed, ranging from ruined cityscapes to haunting interiors, all brought to life with dynamic lighting and eerie sound design. 
Alma is more terrifying than ever, and her unpredictable appearances amplify the tension.
The story delves deeper into the origins of Alma and the sinister experiments that created her. 
While it’s not as cryptic as the original, it still offers plenty of twists and unsettling moments.
Despite a few shortcomings, such as less nuanced AI compared to the first game and a more action-heavy focus, F.E.A.R. 2 is a worthy sequel that modernizes the franchise without losing its essence. 
It’s a must-play for fans of the series and anyone seeking a gripping blend of horror and action.

185485816.review:
F.E.A.R. 2 is quite an interesting one...

A tricky one in fact, depending of the perspective you look at it. Because its ambition is undeniable, and it does so much well as a sequel, but there's also things that make you raise an eyebrow and you can clearly see this is a "post Call of Duty 4" first person shooter. Its predecessor had a one of a kind atmosphere, and a gun play that rivals many games today. Although this game feels super good and has a lot of variety, it doesn't quite hit the spot like the 2005 game did.

Don't get me wrong, there is a lot to love here and I don't wanna fully compare it to the first game. The combat encounters are great, there's more enemy variety, the more "in your face sci-fi horror" is quite fun although not too scary and the Powered Armor sequences were super memorable.

It's a cinematic spectacle that must be enjoyed, I wish I did in its peak honestly, but even today it still holds up!

185275749.review:
第一人称射击+裸露，懂得都懂十分推荐。

大名鼎鼎极度恐慌系列，相比于一代，二代对于现代设备兼容性更好，全程稳60帧。但可惜没有继承一代的高级ai。
困难难度极其变态，满血被秒是常事，游戏设计的多种体术完全没用过，毕竟靠近就死你还敢去踢人家？你以为自己是leon吗？想象下藏在高处的狙击手和火箭炮能秒你，突击兵边朝你扔手雷（ai特有的英勇投弹，能老远直接砸到你身上）一边靠近你，还有能抗两发火箭的重甲兵朝你走来，你缩掩体后面感动吗？但普通难度玩起来又没啥挑战，我这抖m啊。
本作女鬼以长发裸体皮包骨女人的形象出现，比起之前的红衣小孩恐怖感有所下降。教大家一个减轻恐惧的方法，遇到鬼打他两下，一直打到鬼消失，想象成鬼被你打跑了，他啥也不是。
前期略感无聊，但后头多种武器，怪物敌人，机甲的出现又让人提起了兴趣，还是能吸引人打通关的。
玩下来本体15小时，dlc2小时，一个周末就能通关。
以下略有剧透
[spoiler] 剧情我是啥也不知道，只知道一开始要抓人，中途多次被女鬼性骚扰（不穿衣服扑过来用强的，但若男主不反抗只是会挂掉读档而已，要是我就做个战败cg），最后跟队友争夺交配权干了一仗，与女鬼来了段床戏，以男主被捆绑，女鬼怀孕而告终[/spoiler]

185131332.review:
Precedentemente ho acclamato FEAR 1 come uno dei miglior shooter che abbia mai giocato, un classico senza tempo.

FEAR 2? Devo ammettere sono stato leggermente deluso da come il gioco è più... rigido, diciamo. Da un gioco che aveva la sua identita, e un gameplay unico, FEAR 2 sembra che è salito sul treno dei shooter che volevano guadagnare come Call of Duty, che a quel tempo stava diventando ancora più popolare. Però non è un brutto gioco, ansi, Mi sono divertito quanto FEAR 1. La storia non è un granche, qualche colpo di scena e un finale che mi ha fatto dire "Ma che cazz..?". Però è divertente come il primo, dai.

Ah, poi c'è anche Reborn. la premessa di giocare nei panni di un replicante era carina, però la durata del DLC (Circa Mezz'ora, di meno se non fai schifo come me) lo rende relativamente dimenticabile, Batti le ciglia e te lo perdi.

6/10. Mi aspettavo meglio, però è sempre un gioco buono.

Miałem pierwszy kontakt z tą grą tak w połowie podstawówki jak kolega ją kupił w jakimś sklepie z używanymi grami. Wyłączyliśmy ją po 10 minutach jak się zorientowaliśmy, że to horror. Dlatego byłem trochę ciekaw czego się bałem te parenaście lat temu. Jak się pewnie domyślasz, nie było czego się bać. Chodź dobrze, że w nią nie graliśmy, bo chyba nie chciałbym zobaczyć reakcji naszych rodziców jakby zobaczyli cycki na ekranie...

Pobrałem, zagrałem, rozczarowałem się... Graficznie spoko. Gameplay i gunplay też niczego sobie. Solidna strzelanka. Fabularnie lipa. 7 godzin, aby nie rozwinąć fabuły jedynki, a tylko, aby w niej namącić i tak po prawdzie nic nie ugrać. Zakończenie to dość szokujące i wywracający wszystko do góry nogami cliffhanger, ale nie mam ochoty męczyć się z trzecią częścią.

184963073.review:
Um otimo jogo de ação mas um pessimo F.E.A.R

ao contrario do que muitos falam, esse jogo não é ruim, chamar de ruim é um exagero tremendo, os combates freneticos continuam, embora menos impactantes que do primeiro, a seleção de armas é bem legal e os efeitos de gore que cada uma causa ainda são bem feitos, os cenarios são muito bons, principalmente a parte da escola que é incrivelmente tensa

a variedade de inimigos é semelhante ao primeiro, com a diferença que dessa vez você não só enfrenta soldados em armaduras gigantes como tambem pilotas essas armaduras, são só umas 2 ou 3 vezes mas é bem legal

eu sinceramente senti que os momentos de terror desse jogo são mais impactantes e assustadores do que o primeiro, não acho nenhum dos dois absurdo nesse quesito mas esse aqui me assustou mais

sobre a historia(SPOILERS)

só oque posso dizer é que a Alma(a menininha da capa do jogo) virou uma milf ninfomaniaca que quer sentar no protagonista o jogo inteiro, e não, não é brincadeira ou exagero, é exatamente isso, ela até muda a propria aparencia pra tentar agradar o protagonista kkkkkkkkkkkkkkkkk

enfim, é um bom jogo FPS, a ação é frenetica e divertida mas não tem os elementos que tornavam fear 1 unico, como a IA muito bem feita ou os tiroteios dignos de cinema da mais alta qualidade, mas ainda é um bom jogo

eu joguei todo de uma vez e não ficou enjoativo ou chato, vale a pena dar uma chance

184889586.review:
As a person who enjoyed F.E.A.R. and its DLCs, I had some expectations about F.E.A.R. 2. Well... almost everything that F.E.A.R. did well was either removed or downgraded, except for the music and horror elements (those two were good or even better than in F.E.A.R.). They took some ideas from the DLCs, but the core of the game felt shrunken. The tactical aspect I was hoping for (at least for me) didn’t really exist in this game. The shooting had zero satisfaction, and the enemies felt more like Call of Duty than F.E.A.R.. The AI was just generic and uninspiring.
Let's talk about weapons: the throwable items were good and well-made, and most of the guns were decent—well, except for the laser and flamethrower, which were disasters. The sights on the assault rifle and penetrator (which also had its damage nerfed) felt strangely inaccurate. The graphics suited the F.E.A.R. setting, but the character designs were strange and felt off. The level design was mediocre or sometimes even bad (I once parkoured through a level and fell off the map). The story had some depth and was okayish. Music is the best aspect of this creation.
I can barely say anything positive about this game. Finishing it felt unsatisfying, and the gameplay ranged from mid to bad.

184580718.review:
Évaluation : 🌟🌟🌟🌟 (4/5)
"F.E.A.R. 2: Project Origin – L’horreur psychologique en pleine action."

F.E.A.R. 2: Project Origin, développé par Monolith Productions, est un jeu qui mêle habilement horreur psychologique et action effrénée. Avec une ambiance tétanisante, une histoire intrigante et un gameplay solide, ce second opus réussit à enrichir la franchise tout en maintenant la tension qui fait sa réputation.

Les Points Forts :
✅ Une atmosphère de terreur palpable :
F.E.A.R. 2 parvient à créer une ambiance de peur constante, entre les apparitions perturbantes d'Alma et les environnements angoissants. L’angoisse s’installe progressivement, entre moments de silence oppressant et éclats de terreur. Ce jeu vous fait sentir sur le fil du rasoir à chaque instant.

✅ Une excellente direction artistique :
Les décors, les bâtiments abandonnés et les environnements sombres sont magnifiquement conçus. L’introduction de nouveaux lieux, comme l’hôpital ou les rues désertes, amplifie l’immersion dans un monde effrayant.

✅ Un système de combat amélioré :
Le gameplay se caractérise par des fusillades tendues, avec des mécanismes de couverture fluides et un arsenal bien conçu. La possibilité de ralentir le temps, un des éléments emblématiques de la série, reste aussi jouissive qu'avant.

✅ Une histoire prenante :
L’intrigue suit l’histoire de l’origine de l’entité Alma et explore ses conséquences. Bien qu’il soit légèrement plus orienté action que le premier opus, le scénario parvient à maintenir un mystère intrigant jusqu'à la fin.

✅ Un équilibre parfait entre action et horreur :
Contrairement au premier F.E.A.R., qui privilégiait l’aspect horreur pure, ce second jeu mélange astucieusement séquences d’action intenses avec des moments de terreur pure, gardant le joueur constamment sur ses gardes.

Les Points Faibles :
⚠️ Une IA parfois imprévisible :
Si le comportement des ennemis reste généralement solide, certains aspects de l'IA peuvent paraître erratiques. Il n’est pas rare que les ennemis se comportent de manière bizarre dans certaines situations.

⚠️ Des éléments de gameplay répétitifs :
Les affrontements, bien qu'intenses, peuvent devenir un peu redondants au fil du temps. La répétition des mêmes types de missions et de mécaniques de combat peut nuire à la variété de l’expérience.

⚠️ L'horreur psychologique légèrement amoindrie :
Même si F.E.A.R. 2 conserve une atmosphère de terreur, certains éléments d’horreur psychologique qui faisaient la force du premier jeu ont été un peu édulcorés, au profit de l'action.

⚠️ Une fin un peu décevante :
La conclusion du jeu peut sembler précipitée et manque d’un certain impact, ce qui déçoit après une histoire aussi captivante et immersive.

En conclusion :
F.E.A.R. 2: Project Origin est une suite solide qui réussit à capturer l’essence de l’horreur tout en ajoutant des éléments d’action palpitants. L’atmosphère tendue, les combats intenses et l’intrigue sombre assurent une expérience mémorable. Bien que l’horreur psychologique ne soit pas aussi omniprésente que dans le premier jeu, le mélange de tension, de suspense et d'action en fait une aventure passionnante pour les amateurs du genre.

🎮 Verdict final :
Une suite qui réussit à se faire une place parmi les grands jeux d'horreur tout en offrant des moments d'action intenses. Si vous êtes un fan de la franchise ou un amateur d'horreur psychologique, F.E.A.R. 2 est incontournable.

⏳ Temps de jeu recommandé :

Campagne principale : 8 à 10 heures.
Exploration et complétion : 12+ heures pour découvrir tous les secrets.
✨ Note personnelle : Un excellent mélange de frissons et d’action. Si vous cherchez à frissonner tout en vous défoulant, F.E.A.R. 2 est l'expérience qu'il vous faut.

184283540.review: The game offers you a chair to sit on at the end so you can relax after all that bloodshed. Couldn't recommend it enough, all my buddies enjoyed it.

184266001.review: Très déçu par cette suite qui n'arrive pas à la cheville du premier F.E.A.R. ou de son extension Extraction Point : idem que Perseus Mandate, jouer un autre personnage ne n'implique pas dans l'histoire et elle prend même le luxe de me perdre immédiatement avec ses personnages caricatures de soldats dont on arrive même pas à retenir leurs noms tellement ils sont lisses, le jeu est court mais chaque niveau étant tellement ennuyeux qu'il en paraît interminable, le feeling des armes est vraiment mauvais (on a l'impression d'avoir des jouets Nerf) et il faut souvent décharger dans le crâne des ennemis pour enfin les tuer, le retour des robots qui sont encore plus pénibles qu'auparavant vu qu'ils ont désormais un bouclier qu'il faut neutraliser avant de les arroser de tout ce que l'on a pour espérer les détruire, des bugs sont à noter bloquant le passage ou faisant passer la musique de combat en boucle pendant tout un niveau alors qu'il n'y a plus personne… le pire c'est que le jeu n'a plus l'ambiance d'un jeu d'horreur c'est devenu un jeu d'action avec des QTE, sans histoire et de grosses phases de shoot antipathiques. Concernant le DLC, c'est encore plus abusé car il est partiellement traduit, on aura tantôt de l'anglais tantôt du français dans la même suite de répliques, l'histoire est moins intéressante qu'Extraction Point sortie 3 ans plus tôt, pourquoi ne pas s'en être inspiré ? Clairement à passer

184175683.review: Bom demais! Esta sequência, que na verdade se passa quase que simultaneamente ao primeiro, expande mais a história do jogo agregando com personagens novos e aprofundando mais sobre a Genevieve (que é uma das principais responsáveis pela m*rd* toda). Senti falta dos botões de Lean, acho que dá uma empobrecida no combate que é tão marcante no F.E.A.R 1 e as suas DLCs, mas não acho que esse fica tão atrás. O terror também diminuiu bastante e nem se compara ao primeiro, esperava mais terror dessa franquia como um todo, mas para quem não tem costume com jogos de terror talvez seja mais marcante. Pra mim é uma sequência digna, apesar de não superar o primeiro.

184131941.review: Улюблена частина із всієї серії, тут найкращий сюжет та атмосфера. Перестрілки та імпакт від стрілянини не набридають до самого кінця. Вам скоріше всього захочеться одразу пройти сюжетне доповнення reborn, яке зв'язує 1 та 2 частини з третьою. Гра дійсно моторошна коли вона хоче бути такою. Всім раджу взяти колекцію fear за смішні гроші

184101069.review:
Проблема с авто сохранением...

Нет, это даже не шутка! Я думал что навероное как в первой часть нажимаешь на f5 и вот тебе сохранение. Ну максимум когда выходишь тебе игра говорить что надо сохранитья, а то твой прогрес пропадет. Как в любой нормальной игре. Но нет! Вот все давай пока твоим сохранением.
И я не один такой, вот прохожу себе вижу что игра "автосохранилось" я выхожу и делаю свои дела.
И когда я снова хочу поиграть, то все мои сохранение пропали! Просто класс!
Теперь я буду проходить игру на ютубе.

184079696.review:
Bunu da 2010 da oynamışım. Zamanında yaptığım nostaljik incelemeyi aşağıda paylaşıyorum.

15.F.E.A.R. 2 Project Origin(02.12.2010-05.12.2010)

 Alma ile olan bu 2. randevumuzda hem kendisiyle daha haşır neşir oluyoruz hem de kendisini özellikle oyunun sonunda “çok yakından” tanıyoruz.Açıkçası ilk oyunun tadı hala damağımdan gitmedi.O yüzden hem ilk oyunla hem de fps türü içinde oyunu anlatmaya çalışacağım.

 Oyun, karakterimize halüsinasyon şokları uygulayan Alma’nın tacizleriyle başlıyor.İlk oyunun biraz öncesinde atom bombası atılmadan önceki dakikaları yaşıyoruz.Zaten biraz ilerleyince o meşhur bombanın etkisini uzaktan seyredebiliyoruz.7 kişilik bir birlik olarak göreve başlıyoruz.Zaman ilerledikçe bu birliğin “özel seçilmiş” kişiler olduğunu ve Harbinger projesine uygun adamlar olduğunu öğreniyoruz.Kısaca tongaya düştüğümüzü çok ilerde öğreniyoruz.F.e.a.r. 2 nin senaryosu ilkine oranla daha iyi gözüküyor fakat anlatımı yine pek etkili değil.Çünkü yan karakterler pek ilgi çekici değil.Oyunun sonunda iyi toparladıkları da bir gerçek.

 İlk F.e.a.r. ‘a oranla oyun biraz daha açık mekanlarda geçse de yine de klostrofobi duygusunu bazı bölümlerde sık yaşatıyor.Hastane,okul,fabrika,metro, yer altı laboratuarları ve kısmen yüzeyden oluşan ve uzunluğuyla dengeyi sağlayan bir oyun var karşımızda.Oyunun başında grafiklerin ilk F.e.a.r. dan farkı olmadığını düşünürken ilerledikçe ortalamanın altında kalan bir grafik yapısı olduğunu fark ettim.Sesler ilk oyuna oranla maalesef ciddi bir biçimde sınıfta kalıyor.İlk oyunda ki silah sesleri,düşmanın kendi arasında konuşmaları ve patlama efektleri muhteşemdi.2. oyun maalesef bunu mumla aratıyor.Yapay zeka biraz daha geriye gitmiş gibi geldi.Düşman, siperin arkasında vurulmayı bekliyor.Adama 3 kere ateş ettim aralıklarla, tepki vermedi.Belki de bug du tam anlayamadım.Ama oyunun genelinde düşman pek etkili değil.Oyun Hard seviyesinde bile çok kolay.İlki de öyleydi zaten.Şu ana kadar oyunu biraz eleştirdiğimi biliyorum fakat elbette ki oyunun artıları daha fazla.Artık Alma ile kapışmalarımız oluyor.Üstümüze çıkmaya çalışıyor genelde.Hem de çıplak halde Bunun nedenini oyunun sonunda anlıyoruz zaten.

 Hastane bölümü biraz sıkıcı olsa da okul bölümü ve yüzeyde ki çatışmalar güzel olmuş. Özellikle okul bölümü gerçekten güzel tasarlanmış. İlk oyuna göre korku dozajı biraz arttırılmış. İlk oyunda korkunun esamesi yoktu zaten.2. oyunda bazı yerlerde gerilme ihtimaliniz kuvvetle muhtemel. Özellikle ölmeyen hayaletler bu konuda size yardımcı olacaktır. Zaten bir oyunda bir şeyi öldüremiyor ve kaçmak zorundaysanız genel de ondan korkarsınız.
 Yüzeyde ki çatışmalar da bir ara Mech de kullanabiliyorsunuz ve bu ortalığı dağıtmak için biçilmiş kaftan.Oyunun en eğlenceli bölümlerinden biri olduğu kesin.Düşmanları rahat rahat yediye böle böle gidiyorsunuz.Çatışmalar eskisini çok aratıyor.Yine slow motion var fakat eski halini tercih ederdim.Çünkü o zamanki sesler daha güzeldi.Aklıma gelmişken oyunda ki kan efekti çok kötü olmuş.Kanlı yapımları severim ama bu oyunda ki kan çok başarısız ve o kadar fazla var ki bir insandan bu kadar kan çıkabilir mi merak ediyorum.Oyuna bloodbath desek yanılmış olmayız.

 Bunca eleştirinin sebebi aslında ilk oyunun muhteşem olmasıydı.İnsan haliyle daha güzel şeyler bekliyor.En azından iyi olan şeylere dokunmamaları gerekirdi ama insan oğlu rahat durmuyor işte. Project Origin bir fps olarak mutlaka oynanması gereken emek harcanmış bir yapım.Fakat ilk oyunun hayaliyle bu oyuna girişmeyin.Sürpriz sonu da iyi olmuş ve bize şu soruyu sordurtmadan bu inceleme bitemiyor.Ne olacak bu Alma’nın hali?

 Genel Not%85

O jogo é bom, mas...

-tem nem 10% do terror do 1, só uns jumpscare baratos 
-a inteligencia artificial ta bem pior

Recomendo só jogar isso na promoção e se gostar muito de fps.

183547863.review:
I'm definitely the odd one out here, but this game was a waste of time. 

This is just watered down FEAR 1. When you first get into it, its pretty engaging and interesting. But if you buy and play FEAR 1 and its DLCs, you're just getting shortened released version of that content. 

WB games literally said, "We're making FEAR Call of Duty," and while it's nice to aim down your sights and 

That being said, this game is fun and its cut-scenes are FOR SURE a step up from the story telling parts of the first FEAR games. If you're interested in playing through the FEAR series, this game is worth a play through or two, but honestly, if you played the original FEAR and its DLCs you're going to be severely disappointed to play through the same story without *at least* any meaningful enhancements to the game play and weapons.
